result.markdown:
---
title: "Dataframe gymnastics in R, Pyhon and Julia"
draft: true
filters:
    - grouped-tabsets
description: |
    A gallery of data frame opearations in R's tidyverse, data.table, Python's pandas, dask and Julia's DataFrames.jl.
knitr:
    opts_chunk:
          cache: true
          collpase: false
---


I am using R 4.2.0, Python 3.10.6 and Julia 1.8.0

::: {.panel-tabset}

### R
Tidyverse packages


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_1cb05b2b6db776d9e5651b2fdb28a4a3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```
:::


data.table


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_1304e6741fc687bfe5b041eda055664c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)
```
:::


Versions of some core tidyverse packages in this post.


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_dda1fe0a8d51e9bd36471b436d0bfc23'}

```{.r .cell-code}
purrr::map(c("dplyr", "tidyr", "purrr"), packageVersion)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] '1.0.10'
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] '1.2.0'
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] '0.3.4.9000'
```
:::


Version of data.table


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_40ab4d7d5b4a95ebeb8d2f0dc31098bd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
packageVersion("data.table")
#> [1] '1.14.3'
getDTthreads()
#> [1] 5
```
:::



### Python


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_0fd30be46df959a8b8c1cc11613e4e1a'}

```{.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd
import dask as dd
```
:::


Package versions


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_e89ad531220bd9c77c50d2ffbe5ce862'}

```{.python .cell-code}
pd.__version__
#> '1.3.5'
dd.__version__
#> '2022.01.0'
```
:::



### Julia


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_708dfcc68feba828360d88ce9bc1c9de'}

```{.julia .cell-code}
using DataFrames
```
:::


Package version


::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_d906575016a64cdf4abd0d52cfa3c8f7'}

```{.julia .cell-code}
using Pkg
Pkg.status("DataFrames")
#> Status `~/.julia/environments/v1.8/Project.toml`
#>   [a93c6f00] DataFrames v1.3.4
```
:::



:::
